title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Using the flight assistant
description:
In this video we will look at the flight assistant which has been added as part of Sim Update 5 to MSFS 2020. The flight assistant is especially usefull if you are new to MSFS 2020 because it will allow you to delegate some of the tasks to the co-pilot. In addition to this it contains some handy information and allows you to quickly set course to one of the POI's which is close to you.
